scripts.clean:allure: if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report && if exist playwright-report rmdir /s /q playwright-report && if exist extent-report rmdir /s /q extent-report
scripts.Complete:allure: npm run clean:allure && npm run clean:ortoni && npm run clean:console && (npx playwright test tests/CMS_Complete_Flow.spec.js || cmd /c exit 0) && npm run console:html && npm run console:pdf && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:pdf && npm run ortoni:pdf && npm run ortoni:glance:pdf && npm run ortoni:merge:pdf && npm run allure:email
